00007 //    compress.h

00009 // = AUTHOR
00010 //    Stefano Casazza

00012 // ============================================================================
00013 
00014 #ifndef ULIB_COMPRESS_H
00015 #define ULIB_COMPRESS_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/internal/common.h>
00018 
00019 struct U_EXPORT UCompress {
00020 
00021         static uint32_t   compress(const char* src, uint32_t src_len, char* dst);
00022         static uint32_t decompress(const char* src, uint32_t src_len, char* dst);
00023 
00024         // We want to compress the data block at `src' with length `src_len' to
00025         // the block at `dst'. Because the input block may be incompressible,
00026         // we must provide a little more output space in case that compression
00027         // is not possible.
00028 
00029         static uint32_t space(uint32_t src_len)
00030                 {
00031                 U_TRACE(0, "UCompress::space(%u)", src_len)
00032 
00033                 U_RETURN(src_len + src_len / 64 + 16 + 3);
00034                 }
00035 };
00036 
00037 #endif
